description: This header file declares external API functions for the Daemon Server TCP component within the ANSC system, including functions to create, remove, initialize, and shutdown the daemon server object.

methods.name: AnscCreateDaemonServerTcp
methods.description: Creates a new Daemon Server TCP object with specified context handles.

methods.name: AnscDstoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new instance of the Daemon Server TCP object.

methods.name: AnscDstoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified Daemon Server TCP object.

methods.name: AnscDstoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary sub-objects or components into the Daemon Server TCP object.

methods.name: AnscDstoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Daemon Server TCP object.

methods.name: AnscDstoShutdown
methods.description: Shuts down the Daemon Server TCP object.
